mapper.select: SELECT * FROM medicine WHERE medicine_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%') OR medicine_supplier_id LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE medicine AS m SET m.medicine_name=#{medicineName}, m.expiration_date=#{expirationDate}, m.price=#{price}, m.description=#{description}, m.picture=#{picture}, m.medicine_supplier_id = #{medicineSupplierId} WHERE m.medicine_id = #{medicineId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO medicine(medicine_name, medicine_number,production_date,expiration_date, medicine_permitment, description, picture, warning_number,medicine_supplier_id) VALUE (#{medicineName},#{medicineNumber},#{productionDate},#{expirationDate},#{medicinePermitment},#{description},#{picture},#{warningNumber},#{medicineSupplierId})
mapper.select: SELECT medicine_id,medicine_name,medicine_permitment,picture, supplier_name,expiration_date FROM medicine,supplier WHERE medicine_supplier_id = supplier_id
